name: redis-cache-heatmap
description: Redis Cache Heatmap - 3D visualization of cache hits vs misses

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:cpp" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.dev:cpp: cd . && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && ./scuffed-redis-server
scripts.build:cpp: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make
scripts.build: npm run build:cpp && npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix web
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix server" "npm run start --prefix web"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix web
